betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You want to invest into a coke oven, not only do you get useful creosote oil (which can be used as fuel and to treat wood for better pipes and tanks) you also increase the energy output of your coal.

You can also make charcoal in the coke oven (which you can't do in the furnace)

To start the process fill it with some coal and right-click the oven main block with a fire starter (or any other fire making device) It will run as long as it has items and storage for output.
§b
Tip: Place a hopper on top of it to auto insert. Place a hopper below to auto remove the output items. A pipe on any of the bottom blocks also outputs the fluid.

Tip: If you have an advanced crafting table with a water tank next to it, crafting the fire bricks is much easier.
§f§a
To complete this quest you will need to craft:
26 Fire Bricks (Use 25 for the Coke Oven)
1 Coke Oven (Uses 1 Fire Bricks in recipe)
